task.title: Preparing the master host operating system

taskbody.context: Use this procedure to prepare a RHEL/CentOS host as a master host.

step.cmd: Log in to the candidate master host .
Add the required hostnames and IP addresses of both the primary and the secondary node to the /etc/hosts file.

stepxmp.p: For a dual-NIC system, replace each variable name with the values designated for each node, and replace example.com with the domain name of your organization:
stepxmp.codeblock: echo "Primary-Public-IP Primary-Public-Name.example.com \ Primary-Public-Name" >> /etc/hosts echo "Primary-Private-IP Primary-Private-Name.example.com \ Primary-Private-Name" >> /etc/hosts echo "Secondary-Public-IP Secondary-Public-Name.example.com \ Secondary-Public-Name" >> /etc/hosts echo "Secondary-Private-IP Secondary-Private-Name.example.com \ Secondary-Private-Name" >> /etc/hosts

stepxmp.p: For a single-NIC system, replace each variable name with the values designated for each node, and replace example.com with the domain name of your organization:
stepxmp.codeblock: echo "Primary-Public-IP Primary-Public-Name.example.com \ Primary-Public-Name" >> /etc/hosts echo "Secondary-Public-IP Secondary-Public-Name.example.com \ Secondary-Public-Name" >> /etc/hosts

step.cmd: Create a mount point for application data backups.
step.info: The default mount point is /opt/serviced/var/backups. You can change the default by editing the SERVICED_BACKUPS_PATH variable in the configuration file.

step.cmd: Create a mount point for internal services data.
step.info: The default mount point is /opt/serviced/var/isvcs. You can change the default by editing the SERVICED_ISVCS_PATH variable in the configuration file.

step.cmd: Create a mount point for audit logs.
step.info: The default mount point is /var/log/serviced. You can change the default by editing the SERVICED_LOG_PATH variable in the configuration file.

step.cmd: Remove file system signatures from the required storage areas.

stepxmp.p: Replace each variable name with the path of each storage area:
stepxmp.codeblock: wipefs -a Isvcs-Storage wipefs -a Metadata-Storage wipefs -a App-Data-Storage
